fields.label: Jugdement
fields.description: I judge others harshly, and myself even more severely.

fields.label: Trustful
fields.description: I put too much trust in those who wield power within my temple’s hierarchy.

fields.label: Piety
fields.description: My piety sometimes leads me to blindly trust those that profess faith in my god.

fields.label: Hard-Headed
fields.description: I am inflexible in my thinking.

fields.label: Suspicious
fields.description: I am suspicious of strangers and expect the worst of them.

fields.label: Tunnel Vision
fields.description: Once I pick a goal, I become obsessed with it to the detriment of everything else in my life.

fields.label: Shallow
fields.description: I can’t resist a pretty face.

fields.label: Big Spender
fields.description: I'm always in debt. I spend my ill-gotten gains on decadent luxuries faster than I bring them in.

fields.label: Fool
fields.description: I’m convinced that no one could ever fool me the way I fool others.

fields.label: Greedy
fields.description: I’m too greedy for my own good. I can’t resist taking a risk if there’s money involved.

fields.label: Swindler
fields.description: I can’t resist swindling people who are more powerful than me.

fields.label: Self-Preservation
fields.description: I hate to admit it and will hate myself for it, but I'll run and preserve my own hide if the going gets tough.

fields.label: Sticky Fingers
fields.description: When I see something valuable, I can’t think about anything but how to steal it.

fields.label: Avaricious
fields.description: When faced with a choice between money and my friends, I usually choose the money.

fields.label: The Plan
fields.description: If there’s a plan, I’ll forget it. If I don’t forget it, I’ll ignore it.

fields.label: Pinocchio
fields.description: I have a “tell” that reveals when I'm lying.

fields.label: Scaredy-Cat
fields.description: I turn tail and run when things look bad.

fields.label: Piece of Shit
fields.description: An innocent person is in prison for a crime that I committed. I’m okay with that.

fields.label: Fame
fields.description: I’ll do anything to win fame and renown.

fields.label: Scandal
fields.description: A scandal prevents me from ever going home again. That kind of trouble seems to follow me around.

fields.label: Satyrical
fields.description: I once satirized a noble who still wants my head. It was a mistake that I will likely repeat.

fields.label: Outspoken
fields.description: I have trouble keeping my true feelings hidden. My sharp tongue lands me in trouble.

fields.label: Unreliable Friend
fields.description: Despite my best efforts, I am unreliable to my friends.

fields.label: Wanted by Tyrant
fields.description: The tyrant who rules my land will stop at nothing to see me killed.

fields.label: Blind by Destiny
fields.description: I’m convinced of the significance of my destiny, and blind to my shortcomings and the risk of failure.

fields.label: Shameful Secret
fields.description: The people who knew me when I was young know my shameful secret, so I can never go home again.

fields.label: City Enjoyer
fields.description: I have a weakness for the vices of the city, especially hard drink.

fields.label: Secret Tyranny
fields.description: Secretly, I believe that things would be better if I were a tyrant lording over the land.

fields.label: Ally Distrust
fields.description: I have trouble trusting in my allies.

fields.label: Precious
fields.description: I’ll do anything to get my hands on something rare or priceless.

fields.label: Cheater's Eye
fields.description: I’m quick to assume that someone is trying to cheat me.

fields.label: Guild Thief
fields.description: No one must ever learn that I once stole money from guild coffers.

fields.label: Insatiable
fields.description: I’m never satisfied with what I have— I always want more.

fields.label: Kill for Nobility
fields.description: I would kill to acquire a noble title.

fields.label: Craft Envy
fields.description: I’m horribly jealous of anyone who can outshine my handiwork. Everywhere I go, I’m surrounded by rivals.

fields.label: Glutton
fields.description: Now that I've returned to the world, I enjoy its delights a little too much.

fields.label: Innate Bloodthirst
fields.description: I harbor dark, bloodthirsty thoughts that my isolation and meditation failed to quell.

fields.label: Dogmatic
fields.description: I am dogmatic in my thoughts and philosophy.

fields.label: Eristic
fields.description: I let my need to win arguments overshadow friendships and harmony.

fields.label: Anything for Knowledge
fields.description: I’d risk too much to uncover a lost bit of knowledge.

fields.label: Secret Holder
fields.description: I like keeping secrets and won’t share them with anyone.

fields.label: Narcissist
fields.description: I secretly believe that everyone is beneath me.

fields.label: Family-Ruining Secret
fields.description: I hide a truly scandalous secret that could ruin my family forever.

fields.label: Insulted
fields.description: I too often hear veiled insults and threats in every word addressed to me, and I’m quick to anger.

fields.label: Lustful
fields.description: I have an insatiable desire for carnal pleasures.

fields.label: Egocentric
fields.description: In fact, the world does revolve around me.

fields.label: Black Sheep
fields.description: By my words and actions, I often bring shame to my family.

fields.label: Alcohol Admirer
fields.description: I am too enamored of ale, wine, and other intoxicants.

fields.label: Zero Caution
fields.description: There’s no room for caution in a life lived to the fullest.

fields.label: Grudge Holder
fields.description: I remember every insult I’ve received and nurse a silent resentment toward anyone who’s ever wronged me.

fields.label: Intolerant
fields.description: I am slow to trust members of other races, tribes, and societies.

fields.label: Violent
fields.description: Violence is my answer to almost any challenge.

fields.label: As is Nature
fields.description: Don’t expect me to save those who can’t save themselves. It is nature’s way that the strong thrive and the weak perish.

fields.label: Information Distraction
fields.description: I am easily distracted by the promise of information.

fields.label: Reckless Passion
fields.description: Most people scream and run when they see a demon. I stop and take notes on its anatomy.

fields.label: At Any Cost
fields.description: Unlocking an ancient mystery is worth the price of a civilization.

fields.label: Complicator
fields.description: I overlook obvious solutions in favor of complicated ones.

fields.label: Disinhibition
fields.description: I speak without really thinking through my words, invariably insulting others.

fields.label: Untrustworthy
fields.description: I can’t keep a secret to save my life, or anyone else’s.

fields.label: Obedient
fields.description: I follow orders, even if I think they’re wrong.

fields.label: Slacker
fields.description: I’ll say anything to avoid having to do extra work.

fields.label: Vain Courage
fields.description: Once someone questions my courage, I never back down no matter how dangerous the situation.

fields.label: Alcoholic
fields.description: Once I start drinking, it’s hard for me to stop.

fields.label: Kleptomaniac
fields.description: I can’t help but pocket loose coins and other trinkets I come across.

fields.label: Pride Demise
fields.description: My pride will probably lead to my destruction.

fields.label: Monster PTSD
fields.description: The monstrous enemy we faced in battle still leaves me quivering with fear.

fields.label: Warrior Respect
fields.description: I have little respect for anyone who is not a proven warrior.

fields.label: Battle Mistake
fields.description: I made a terrible mistake in battle cost many lives— and I would do anything to keep that mistake secret.

fields.label: Blind Hatred
fields.description: My hatred of my enemies is blind and unreasoning.

fields.label: Law-Abiding
fields.description: I obey the law, even if the law causes misery.

fields.label: Fragile Ego
fields.description: I’d rather eat my armor than admit when I’m wrong.

fields.label: Outnumbered
fields.description: If I'm outnumbered, I will run away from a fight.

fields.label: CREAM
fields.description: Gold seems like a lot of money to me, and I’ll do just about anything for more of it.

fields.label: Pistanthrophobia
fields.description: I will never fully trust anyone other than myself.

fields.label: Unfair Fighter
fields.description: I’d rather kill someone in their sleep then fight fair.

fields.label: Theft Justification
fields.description: It’s not stealing if I need it more than someone else.

fields.label: The Weak Perish
fields.description: People who can't take care of themselves get what they deserve.
